articles.title: Microsoft: December security updates cause Message Queuing failures - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Microsoft has confirmed that the December 2025 security updates are breaking Message Queuing (MSMQ) functionality, affecting enterprise applications and Internet Information Services (IIS) websites.

articles.title: MSI MEG X870E Godlike X Edition Review - TechPowerUp
articles.description: MSI aims for the AMD motherboard crown with one of the most over the top halo tier models we've seen yet. You get a crazy specification with cutting edge features and an equally mad price. But has MSI done enough to beat the competition?

articles.title: New Galaxy S23 update makes it more secure - SamMobile
articles.description: After the Galaxy S25 and the Galaxy S24, Samsung has now released the December 2025 security patch for the Galaxy S23 series, making the three devices in the lineup more secure. Currently, Samsung is rolling out the update in its home country, South Korea. Th…

articles.description: Amazon also has a few of the new Pokemon Trading Card Game Premium Collections and Mega ex Boxes in stock.

articles.title: The Opt-In Proactive & Crash Time Data Collection On Valve's Steam Deck - Phoronix
articles.description: Valve's Steam Deck with SteamOS features built-in crash data collection as well as for logging other system events worth having knowledge about like the split-lock detection and other events
